Patrick Kenzie.action: I started going to Church again. I saw them bury Remy and, for the first time in years, maybe ever, I prayed for someone.

Patrick Kenzie.action: I did everything I wanted to do. I proved my father wrong. I either learned my lesson or became a man, I can't tell the difference.

Patrick Kenzie.action: Remy was right, I know very little--but what I do know, I am sure of: I was wrong about that commercial. 'Shouldn't your dog be treated like a member of the family?' It doesn't depend on the dog. It depends on the family.
Patrick Kenzie.assessment: Patrick's admission of being wrong and his insight about family dynamics reveal humility and a deeper understanding of human relationships, indicating genuine warmth and trustworthiness.
